headings.usage: Use for all section headers, hero titles, and modal titles. Tight tracking for sizes > 32px.

body.usage: Use for all paragraphs, inputs, and data tables. Excellent for multi-language legibility.

mono.usage: Use for pricing numbers, transaction IDs, and technical data.

primary.name: Warm Terracotta
primary.usage: Primary CTAs, 'Urgent' badges, Heart icons. Represents human warmth and immediate help.

secondary.name: Deep Ocean Blue
secondary.usage: Headers, Navigation, Trust indicators, 'Verified' badges. Represents professionalism and security.

marketing.grid_style: Bento Grid Mode A (The Tetris Grid)
rules: Never center text by default on landing pages.
Use overlapping elements to create depth.
Use 100% height for widgets to align perfectly.
Cardless design preferred for data tables.

buttons.animation: Scale down on click (active:scale-95), Lift on hover (-translate-y-0.5)

cards.style: Flat background with 1px subtle border (border-slate-200). No heavy drop shadows.

inputs.style: Shadcn default but with increased padding (h-12) for touch accessibility.

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle grain/noise on solid backgrounds to avoid 'flat' digital look.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use 'Crystal Glass' (backdrop-blur-xl + border-white/40) for sticky headers and floating action buttons.
visual_enhancers.motion: All interactive elements must have layout transitions. Use 'framer-motion' for page transitions.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for all text. Use APCA standards.
accessibility.screen_readers: All images must have descriptive alt text. Use semantic HTML.

instructions_to_main_agent: DO NOT use generic 'Inter' font for headings. Import 'Manrope' and 'IBM Plex Sans' from Google Fonts.
Implement a 'Language Selector' prominently in the top nav.
Ensure the 'Urgent Help' button is the most visible element on the screen (Sticky on mobile).
Use the 'Warm Terracotta' color sparingly for high-impact actions only.
For the 'Provider Dashboard', prioritize data density and clarity over decorative elements.
All forms must be accessible and keyboard navigable.
Do not use gradients for text or backgrounds unless it is a very subtle noise texture.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop' aesthetics (generic centered layouts, blue/purple gradients).
Create depth through z-index and layered elements.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
Never use transparent backgrounds without a blur or scrim.
